results.content:
Es útil para los que recién se inician en CSS. Para mi gusto pasa mucho tiempo con los conceptos más básicos y poco con lo más complejo de CSS3.
Otra cosa que no me gustó es que el instructor habla demasiado. No está mal hacer uno que otro comentario de vez en cuando, pero creo que debería ser más conciso en su discurso.

It's useful for the ones who are just starting to learn CSS. For my personal taste it spends a lot of time with the basic concepts and too little time with the advanced concepts of CSS3.
Another thing that I didn't like is that the instructor talks too much. It's not bad to make one comment once in a while, but it should be more concise in his speech.

Another thing that I didn't like is that the instructor talks too much. It's not bad to make one comment once in a while, but it should be more concise in his speech.

results.content: A really awesome course on CSS.... highly recommended from my side...
